amendment.description: Amendment sought to require FERC to impose cost-of-service rates on sales by public utilities of electric energy in the western energy market until new power generators come online and exempt new power plants from the rate restriction.
amendment.purpose: Part B amendment numbered 7 printed in House Report 107-178 to direct FERC to impose cost-of-service based rates on electricity generators selling in the Western market for 18 months, until new power supplies come on line and to exempt new power plants from this requirement.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Waxman amendment (A007) Failed by recorded vote: 154 - 274 (Roll no. 314).
